title: 3 and Out - Belichick OC Legacy Play, Rams Blueprint Cloning, Nobody Wants Baker, Malik Willis Rising, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Belichick OC Legacy Play, Rams Blueprint Cloning, Nobody Wants Baker, Malik Willis Rising, Mailbag
description:
John discusses why Bill Belichick would consider serving as the de facto OC for the Pats, and why Les Snead's approach to building the Rams by trading draft picks has gone from being mocked to being copied around the league this offseason. He also gives some quick takes on top headlines, including the Browns haven't dealt Baker yet, the Bills new stadium deal, why Liberty QB Malik Willis' stock is rising so fast leading up to the draft, what he saw at the owners meetings that is a huge red flag for the Panthers, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
